ground_truth.thought: 获取该客户的收入稳定性
ground_truth.name: IncomeStability.get_records

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CreditHistory.get_records', 'description': 'Get the credit history records of a client.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'credit_history', 'description': 'the credit history records of the client'}]}, {'name': 'IncomeStability.get_records', 'description': 'Get the income stability records of a client.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'income_stability', 'description': 'the income stability records of the client'}]}, {'name': 'DebtRatio.get_records', 'description': 'Get the debt ratio records of a client.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'client_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the client'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'debt_ratio', 'description': 'the debt ratio records of the client'}]}, {'name': 'LoanApproval.get_recommendation', 'description': 'Get a loan approval recommendation based on risk assessment.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'risk_assessment', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the risk assessment result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendation', 'description': 'the loan approval recommendation'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名信贷分析师，正在评估某客户的信用贷款申请风险。首先，我需要获取该客户的信用历史记录。然后，获取该客户的收入稳定性。接下来，获取该客户的负债比率。最后，请提供一些基于风险评估的贷款审批建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取该客户的信用历史记录
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'client_id'的值是什么?
{'credit_history': 'The client has a good credit history with no defaults in the past 5 years.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'credit_history': 'The client has a good credit history with no defaults in the past 5 years.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 获取该客户的收入稳定性记录。
